item.title: Build a Full Stack App with create-t3-app

item.description: Nexdle is a wordle clone made with React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Vite, Zustand and tested with Vitest.

item.description: Elevate your code by writing declarative, and easy-to-read code with pattern matching.
